name: Steadfast (Devalopodprod)
description:
...and then the world ended, but those in the Steadfast began their ascent.

A prototype. Will be adding levels and making changes as I go, including more levels and art tweaks.

Feedback welcome.

[A quick note: The viewport is configured for 600x800. Fullscreen is recommended. If it appears small in the window (noted in all browsers), I would encourage you to try a few different zooms and refresh as needed. I found that it worked a bit differently on each browser and on each OS.]

Credits:

Art by Devalopod

Music by PDK - Sci-fi Music Pack 1 - Cargo Ship, found on Itch.io

FX found on Freesound.org, done by Veiler and a few anons
